capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid in person, and I have to say, he does look quite tall for a gamekeeper. The way he moves with such ease, it's almost like he's gliding across the ground. I'm pretty sure that's what people mean when they describe him as "surprisingly-tall".
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, valeria, i have to say, i've never heard of someone being called "surprisingly tall" before   that's a new one! tell me more about this person.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's definitely one of the tallest people in the Hogwarts staff. I mean, it's not every day you see someone who can cast spells with such ease and still manage to tower over everyone else. Hagrid looks surprisingly-tall
